acidity.notes: Slight tang at the beginning of the sip.

sweetness.notes: It's there more than the last one (all body and nothing else).

finish.notes: Slight warm alkaline taste. Mouth is still really drying out.

flavor: Uninteresting. Good body, but tasting notes are still rather muted (though more present than last time) and tongue feels very sandpapery after drinking the full cup.
notes: Poured gently on to bloom but did try to clean the sides a bit. Did the generous swirl and tap but I could already tell this one was slower.
actionItem: Pour strictly onto the slurry â€” don't clean the sides. Let the swirl at the end of brew clean them. Continue using the generous bloom swirl and drawdown swirl so that you're changing only one variable.
